title.rendered: “Overnight Operation: IDF Arrests 17 Wanted Individuals in Judea and Samaria – The Latest Strike Against Hamas”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF soldiers, Shin Bet and Border Police operated overnight to arrest 17 wanted individuals throughout Judea and Samaria.

The security forces operated overnight to arrest 17 wanted individuals throughout Judea and Samaria. The soldiers conducted many suspect investigations in the city of Hebron in the Judea Brigade.

The arrested wanted individuals were transferred for further investigation by the security forces, our forces did not suffer any casualties.

So far, since the beginning of the war, about 3,450 wanted individuals have been arrested throughout the Judea and Samaria division and the Jordan Valley division, about 1,500 of them are affiliated with the Hamas terrorist organization.
